price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߞߊ߲߫ ߕߋ߲߬ ߠߋ߬ ߝߛߊߦߌ߫ ߓߊ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߦߋ߫ ߥߘߋ߬ߥߘߋ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߟߐ߲ߠߌ߲ߠߊ ߟߋ߬
arabic: قَالُواْ كَذَٰلِكِ قَالَ رَبُّكِۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū kadhāliki qāla rabbuki innahu huwa al-ḥakīmu al-ʿalīmu
